<<<<<<< HEAD
Remaines concerning Britain their languages, names, surnames, allusions, anagrammes, armories, monies, empreses, apparell, artillarie, wise speeches, proverbs, poesies, epitaphs / written by William Camden ... Camden, William, 1551-1623. Philipot, John, 1589?-1645. W. D., Gent.
The sixth impression,
[9], 408, [4] p. : port., coats of arms.
Printed for Simon Waterson and Robert Clavell, London : 1657.
Filmed copy contains three title pages. The second has imprint, 'By Thomas Warren for Isabella Waterson'; the third has imprint, 'For Simon Miller'. The final four pages are numbered 332, 334, 331, and [unnumbered] Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======

The sixth impression,
[9], 408, [4] p. : port., coats of arms.
Printed for Simon Waterson and Robert Clavell, London : 1657.
Filmed copy contains three title pages. The second has imprint, 'By Thomas Warren for Isabella Waterson'; the third has imprint, 'For Simon Miller'. The final four pages are numbered 332, 334, 331, and [unnumbered] Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
